meanings.definition: In a stringent or exact manner
meanings.sent1: She followed the rules strictly during the exam.
meanings.sent2: He strictly adhered to the recipe while baking the cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked at the 'No Pets Allowed' sign strictly before sneaking in.
meanings.sent4: Her face remained strictly neutral during the intense negotiation.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's eyes watched the students strictly as they took the test.

meanings.sent1: The decision was strictly based on the facts presented.
meanings.sent2: She strictly wanted to focus on her studies without any distractions.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was strictly sleight of hand, no magic involved.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was strictly to his family, above all else.
meanings.sent5: The artist's inspiration came strictly from nature's beauty.

meanings.sent1: The company policy was strictly enforced by the manager.
meanings.sent2: The team strictly followed the game plan to secure their victory.
meanings.sent3: The robot's programming was strictly to clean the floors, nothing else.
meanings.sent4: His routine was strictly wake up, exercise, work, sleep.
meanings.sent5: The schedule was strictly organized to maximize productivity.
